website_summaries.verdict: A great showpiece for your dining room or foyer, but it takes up a lot of space.
pros: Five bulbs brighten up the space
Large fixture great for making a statement
cons: Some have said it's too large for rooms with 8-foot ceilings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, fairly simple to assemble with 2 people, perfect for my 12 ft foyer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jansen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It's a great deal for the price. Plus it looks great on my 19th century inspired living room.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This light looks great over our kitchen table! We get compliments all of the time. When I pulled it out of the box (assembly required), I thought it was going to be too big, but I think it is the perfect size. It's nice and bright and makes cool patterns on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Redecorated our living room and wanted to get rid of that ugly ceiling fan! We have a 10-11' cathedral ceiling and it fits perfect! I had to put some bling bling on, just to match my personality! I didn't wanted to drill holes in the metal, so I ordered magnetic jewlery clasps and prisms from Amazon and it worked like a charm! Don't mind my mess, not finished remodeling yet lolol
customer_reviews.author: Paws with Class

customer_reviews.title: Extermely happy with the chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Extermely happy with the chandelier. I read all the reviews about needing high celilings. We have 8 feet celilings and love how the light looks installed. We added a dimmer and it's perfect above the dining room table. It took a little patience putting it together. I would recommend putting it together one day and installing the next. You can go wrong with the price. Most lighting I was looking at was priced much higher.
customer_reviews.author: lyon1

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice hanging
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a lot of pieces. Not too hard to put together, but tedious. Quality and set up remind me of IKEA. There are pieces that screw into each other and some that fit into holes. Well, one piece didn't in the hole, the two bars don't even touch and it's frustrating (pictured). The price isn't too bad (if it all fit right) and the size and shape work well in our space. It looks great hanging up, but just wish it was made a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: It does look great, but it's not constructed very well.
customer_reviews.text: Although this chandelier looks great in our dining room (if you aren't looking too close), we have quite a few issues with the construction of it. The candelabras on our chandelier are croocked(see pics) and the notches made to hold the cylinders in place, don't line up with the grooves(see pics). Putting it together wasn't super complicated but again the notches weren't lining up and that made harder than it should've been to construct.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is so amazing and just stunning! It just elevates the look of my breakfast nook and makes it look so elegant and modern. I truly couldn't be happier. The quality, size, price, shipping and assembly was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Dramatic, Rustic, Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, and yes it is brown (not black, as some reviewers have said). Was a bit tricky to assemble, as two of the screws would not hold, so we had to use superglue. But it is beautiful, very large and looks much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: maryjo

customer_reviews.title: Love this chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This fixture fills the staircase hallway with elegance and quality. One arm did arrive bent, but the seller sent replacements quickly, and it went together fine after that. We bought a slider light switch and used dimmable LED lights that can brightened or lowered. Everyone comments on it in a positive way. It does take a bit of patience to assemble it, but once together, you'll find it was worth the effort. We bought it two years ago and still get friends asking where we bought it so they can buy one too. It is well worth the price being asked. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McClory

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but not the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous chandelier - was a pain for my electrician and I to assemble and parts of it weren't "fitted" appropriately, requiring a drill and screws and glue. But it's beautiful once assembled and as it hangs over my foyer, it doesn't need to be the "nicest" thing ever. It's also cheaper than similar fixtures. My own issue is I didn't realize until I got it that it doesn't hold standard light bulbs.I have no idea how I'll replace the light bulbs down the road seeing as it's 20' in the air but doesn't take CFLs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for our remodel cuz the wife wanted something ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our remodel cuz the wife wanted something different. Contractor put it together but he reported nothing unusual in assembly. The 5 lights allow for ample lighting for our dining room. We've received multiple positive comments from people who've seen it. The light is fairly large, I would say beachball sized.
customer_reviews.author: H3H8M3

customer_reviews.title: You definitely get what you pay for BUT once hung if it looks like the one from RH I'll be happy
customer_reviews.text: This light looks similar to the RH light but much more affordable. However, when I tell you that it's a major PIA to put together....trust me. I bent one of the metal pieces trying to align it with the screw hole. I'm hoping that when we hang it tomorrow that it stays aligned as it's currently being held with the zip ties that they supply for you to use when assembling it. You definitely get what you pay for BUT once hung if it looks like the one from RH I'll be happy! I'll update with photos once we hang it.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! If you can follow directions, you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! I'm a picky consumer. I do a lot of research and Waht I really wanted was an Orb chandelier from Ballard Designs. But I took a chance on this one, since the picture looks very very similar. What a value! I had fun putting this together. It's not difficult. All the pieces are labeled and instructions and pictures are clear. The finished product is gorgeous! Looks stunning and much more expensive than it was. Compare to Ballard for $300+. For half the price, you can't go wrong. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kerrica

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you don’t mind damaged goods for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating because the light is pretty this came damaged. Most pieces had scratches on it. Then once you put it together things don’t match up making this assembly process a nightmare. It feel like I got ripped off knowing this product wasn’t right from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this..
customer_reviews.text: I rehab homes. My preference is restoration hardware, but the budget dosen't always allow their pricing. This light has to be put together, but will save you about a grand. Seriously, we have a RH outlet in our area and it would still be $1k+. With dimmable Edison LED's this is $200, done, beautiful, and makes a huge impact. If your on the fence, buy it...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the product and seems good- but it came missing a screw. And they happen to be screws that we can’t find at any local hardware stores (metric sized). I can’t see a way to contact the seller to request an extra screw so we are having to buy an enormous pack of screws online to put this together. Pretty frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Big impact for price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for a very large (24") globe for 20 ft. entry. Looks bigger than in picture. Glad we went big because chandelier is not chunky. Needed two people, but was easy to assemble. Looks fantastic in same large living room with Yobo 6 arm dining chandelier because rods are skinny. Used Besarm 13 year led bulbs for extreme height, and Amazon installation in Orange County CA was terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Herring

customer_reviews.title: Very handy here but it's nearly impossible to build
customer_reviews.text: Surpised by the reveiws that said it's easy to assemble. It's far from it. One requirement is a very skinny, long, flat head screwdriver which is neither included (fair) nor easy to find. You'll need it to reach an acute angle for assembling and if you don't have it, it won't go together. The clearance for your fingers to hold things together is minimal and it's overall, just a lot more trouble than any other chandeliers of this price/style.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES DORSEY

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful value priced chandelier
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful value priced chandelier. I like it more than I thought I might. Excellent enhancement to the foyer of our Mid-century Modern influenced home. Expect it to take time to assemble; took our pro installer nearly an hour. Seller was swift in delivery. Easy transaction.
customer_reviews.author: SMO

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for the room.
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t work in the space, it’s just sitting in our garage now. My reccomentsion to a potential buyer is to measure the area and find something of similar size and shape to ensure you’ll like it. At no fault of the manufacturer we didn’t love it and it’s just sitting in our garage now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing. easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: amazing. easy to put together, makes a beautiful statement in my stair entry. I paired it with edison LED candelabra bulbs that I bought at costco and they work perfectly. Installation was easy (based on what I watched!). Worth the price, I think this light will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Anacan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this light, it's not perfect but you can't tell when it's hung up high. We wanted one similar from home depot ($600) and found this for a fraction of the price and people think it's really high quality and expensive even though we got it for such a deal on here!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't hung ours yet, but I did put it together. Do not be scared about putting it together. I read a bunch of reviews that said it was difficult. For me, it was very easy. I did it by myself in about 30 min. It only took that long because I misread the directions. When I took the zip ties off, the arms did pop off. I think I'm going to try to superglue it rather than leaving the zip ties on. I'll update once it is truly installed but so far I'm impressed and excited!
customer_reviews.author: LibbyHiner

customer_reviews.title: This light is worth it. Trust me.
customer_reviews.text: This style was something I searched for forever & couldn't find one under $500 that I liked. I found this & assumed it would be too good to be true but I'd give it a shot. It's amazing. Pros: Fabulous style and super pretty shadows when turned on. Price- duh. Super light weight so you can hang it anywhere. Cons: Not a fun thing to put together but didn't take too long. Just annoying. Worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover EM

customer_reviews.title: Great chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Easy to install. The only reason I took a point away is because the “candles” are crooked! Enough that it’s noticeable and I can’t get them straight.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Christmas Harper

customer_reviews.title: Chandlier
customer_reviews.text: Love how this light turned out! Took along time to put together but i would buy it again because it was the best value for money and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sarkinen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look! Please take a look to the picture
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look! Please take a look to the picture. Customer service was awesome to work with!
customer_reviews.author: nathalia perez

customer_reviews.title: I love this chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier! I hung it in the center of my living/ dining space. it really brings the place together. its not too large, but big enough. I also attached a crystal to the bottom to look more like the Z-gallerie chandeliers at just a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Reshma

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our home!
customer_reviews.text: Measurements were accurate, light looks amazing in our foyer! I was a little nervous it'd be too modern for our traditional home, but the contrast is wonderful! We have vaulted ceilings, and it was easy to hang - very lightweight! Would definitely come to Amazon again for lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Had to put together and some of the fittings didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to put together and some of the fittings didn't stay together and had to use ties to hold together on outer rings otherwise looks good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Hung it over my kitchen island and it's a statement piece. Great price
customer_reviews.author: R Q

customer_reviews.title: Could have been made a bit better, but very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice looking and not too hard to put together. They have now marked the A1 and A2 elements so there is no confusion as to the assembly. Only complaint is that it did not quite line and we still had to keep the "temporary" zip ties in place to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight. Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Not great quality but once installed, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jef A. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful orb!
customer_reviews.text: Love this orb!! I was looking for a unique orb light and after looking through so many, I came across this one. It is so beautiful and looks great in the breakfast area over my table. There were two areas where the rings didn't fit flush where they crossed, but I'm going to just super glue it in place. No one sees the flaw, I just want to add stability at the joint.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I love this fixture
customer_reviews.text: I love this fixture! It was easy to put together, straightforward to install. I’ve been really happy with the graphic element it adds to our entryway. I was worried that I wouldn’t like the shadows that it casts, but that hasn’t been the case at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful illumination!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Assembly was pretty straight forward. I did use some extra mini zip ties to hold the loops in place during assembly. Once fully assembled, cut them off and everything stays in place perfectly. Have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Divertiamoci

customer_reviews.title: The chain is long to where you can adjust the height easily. 3
customer_reviews.text: We received the chandelier yesterday, while assembling it: 1. Some of the screws did not hold the bars together- which I had to pinch closed with pliers. 2. The chain is long to where you can adjust the height easily. 3. The bottom bars do not touch or stay closed so the shape is not spherical- more oblong. 4. Also, it does not come with screws to hang on the ceiling. 5. Overall, for the price it is what it is- probably more frustrating to return and disassemble at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not oil rubbed bronze
customer_reviews.text: If you want a brown chandelier you will love this. It really isn't bronze, its just brown. Like spray painted brown. Sadly, this must go back. It shouldn't be called "oil rubbed bronze" should be called "plain old brown" or simply "brown" or "spray painted brown".
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this light. It's STUNNING!!
customer_reviews.text: light is so stunning. I'm obsessed with it! It's so much prettier in person! Well made, but not so heavy that it over powers a room. I have it over my dining table and it's just so pretty. The only downside is that they chain is so hard to get open to attach it to the base and stuff that is scratched up the chain. Nothing a marker can't fix but a little annoying. Also the directions are crappy. But I was able to put together and install the light in 45 min. Seriously worth EVERY PENNY! I'm planning on buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chandelier! It took a while to put together but it was worth it! I also added crystals to give it a little something extra!
customer_reviews.author: Just a Dude

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful it is perfent in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure but kept going back to this light and once it was up I knew it was the right decision it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: SHERI GOODRICH

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect light for the space except I has to epoxy the outer most ring to the rest as it was bigger than the rest and wouldn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mama X

customer_reviews.title: I added a dimmer & it is so pretty day or night
customer_reviews.text: I hung this fixture over my breakfast table in my kitchen & it is gorgeous!! Very shiny with its chrome finish, I added a dimmer & it is so pretty day or night! I get alot of compliments on it. I have more of a rustic looking round breakfast table with white linen chairs & it really adds that extra sparkle to the area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern Farmhouse Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is absolutely stunning! My husband said it was a little difficult to install, but other than that- this hits the mark for modern farmhouse! The value and quality for the price is outstanding! It’s just gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sloat

customer_reviews.title: Great chandelier, for not much money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful simple light fixture. So easy to install. I have 16 foot ceiling in my foyer and the chain was perfect for my size. I even took a couple links out of it. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: F.A.B

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: It's missing 1 light holder. I'm trying to find out how to contact the company so I get it. Looks like it happened at their factory. Overall the light looks decent. Haven't installed it yet
customer_reviews.author: Liz C.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Light
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this chandelier. It looks fantastic in our home office and makes a real statement. I added a few crystals to enhance it.
customer_reviews.author: Chardonnannie

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: Great light. I get many, many compliments on this light. Added just the right touch to my dining room. Great value compared with similar lights I looked at. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Santos

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is stunning! It was not that easy to put together but it was all worth it. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is annoying!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is annoying!!! It took me a while and at the end one of the rods does not line up with opening that should hold it in place. therefore it does not have the desired orb look. So wish I did not buy this. Not sure if I will use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzana Ciganikova

customer_reviews.title: Tedious assembly was aggravated by a missing screw and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Tedious assembly was aggravated by a missing screw and a piece that was stripped. The box arrived with a roach. I glued it together because of the missing parts and it's up, but it is flimsy. It looks like the picture. As long as no one touches or bumps it, we should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lori in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Nice and different!
customer_reviews.text: I have received many compliments on this chandelier! I put it together all by myself :) and my husband installed it. It wasn't to hard for me to put together but I did leave on one of the zip ties just in case one of the joints came apart.
customer_reviews.author: BreeViews

customer_reviews.title: Nice look!  Takes longer than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: The overall look is nice. The product requires some use of pliers to make sure it all bends together properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made! And at a fraction of the price — highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design - craftsmanship is a little cheap. Had to leave some zip-ties on the chandelier itself to get it to hold in place correctly. Still, a very cheap, clean alternative to the more expensive Foucault's Orb chandeliers out there.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cho

customer_reviews.title: Brings the house together
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier has really made our home come together. It brought a whole new feel to the house! It's absolutely beautiful once hung and create a beautiful design on the walls and ceiling when the lights are on. Apparently the light bulbs it takes are a little pricey, but I feel it was worth it for the beautiful chandelier we have.
customer_reviews.author: belvoirm

customer_reviews.title: Its a great price. Buy some edison bulbs and it really ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this. Its a great price. Buy some edison bulbs and it really looks current/modern. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this light
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this light. It is absolutely gorgeous and I think a steal for what it cost. We installed it in our stairway and it's very bright with the dark walls so overall I would recommend this product in a heartbeat, especially if this is the style/design you fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic light! exactly as described and looks wonderful over ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic light! exactly as described and looks wonderful over our dining room table. It was just what we were looking for and at a good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Shanes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This light is beautiful and looks much more expensive than it was. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra $50 at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.text: The light is crooked (and no, it is not an assembly error). The bulbs that Amazon says people buy with it do not fit, and it is a pain to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Have it hanging from high ceiling in my foyer and I think I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous!! Home going through complete renovation and I think this sets the tone for the direction. Have it hanging from high ceiling in my foyer and I think I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette M

customer_reviews.title: This looks amazing in our dining room
customer_reviews.text: I wired it up with ease (using the directions of course). This looks amazing in our dining room! We love it. If we move its coming too!
customer_reviews.author: Bjoyner1

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG SO GORGEOUS!!! I get compliments from everyone who sees it! I hung it in my bathroom, as the ceiling is very tall and I needed to fill the empty space with a large light. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Agr1583

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture, unfortunately, it was too large for my space so I returned it. Wish it had worked in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah reese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful light can be dimmed really enjoy the look and brightness of it.
customer_reviews.author: ANTZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light... Very modern and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble, I agree with another reviewer that using zip ties helps immensely. Love the look and size, only wish it had longer chain and wire as my foyer is 18' high and would have wanted it to hang a bit lower. Overall, happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: MAG040777

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but will not stay in shape without zip ties.
customer_reviews.text: It is really a pretty fixture, but the outer circle had notches to hold it in place but they don't. My husband had to put small zip ties to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: I shop too much!

customer_reviews.title: I love this chandelier.... But..
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy the Amazon recommended Edison bulbs! The "frequently bought together" items do not work together. You need a C type bulb. I waited for 4 weeks to get the bulbs only to realize that they do not fit into this chandelier. Now I have to coordinate with the Chinese company that sent them. The light itself is great. Easy to assemble and gets lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this fixture! It was the perfect choice for our office. It is pretty big though, so make sure you look at the dimension's. I highly recommend this chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McMath

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, but took a while to install. The wiring wasn't the hard part. It was just one of the steps assumed that you did 6 things to complete that step so we had to unscrew things a few times which was annoying. Once it was installed, though, the fact it was a pain in the butt made it worth it. Looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Exactly what I wanted but hundreds of dollars less. Took a long time to put together. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandelier that adds class and flare to our living room. I love it's large scale size, but delicate features. It adds to the room, without overshadowing everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus Flower

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not do this chandler justice. Yes it is a little painful to assemble but so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori cj

customer_reviews.title: It does look great after it's assembled though
customer_reviews.text: A little bit difficult to assemble. I had to use Gorilla Glue to keep a couple of the cross points together. It does look great after it's assembled though.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Looks great, get lots of compliments. It is not the best packaging, some of the screws were not included but it wasn't a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this light
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this light!!! Wow, its so pretty and LARGE! Not a big deal to put together, took 2 of us and it was up in no time. VERY happy with this purchase. Looks gorgeous above my dining room table.
customer_reviews.author: JVGIRL

customer_reviews.title: and is a very nice change from the usual chandeliers seen over dining tables
customer_reviews.text: This is just as it looked in the pictures, and is a very nice change from the usual chandeliers seen over dining tables. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light, amazing price
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun light fixture, and receives many compliments. Well made and great price! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BB2016

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light especially for the price. We have gotten many compliments. I was afraid it would be overpowering because our dining room ceiling is low, but because it is very open it looks great. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Big and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This light is amazing. A bit frustrating to put together but after it’s up you are going to love it. Don’t hestitate.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Mielcarek

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, very bright
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions and you won't mess this up, a couple of the light bulb metal bases are not perfectly machined/bent so that was only negative for us
customer_reviews.author: T. B. Young

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: This light is so cool. I put it together and it took a little bit but it was worth it. Great price and easy to put up and wire.
customer_reviews.author: w jansse

customer_reviews.title: great look / same look is twice the price in high-end stores
customer_reviews.text: We love this light. Took some time to put together, but just follow directions (re-read if you need to) and follow exactly what is written. The color is drk brown, but looks fine with black accents in our room. because it is very high Put light on dimmer for a soft look
customer_reviews.author: JayDee

customer_reviews.title: We really like the look of this light
customer_reviews.text: We really like the look of this light. It wasn't difficult to put together; the instructions were actually fairly clear.
customer_reviews.author: Zig's mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light.
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. Looks great in our newly build house. Builder required UL listed and this one is!
customer_reviews.author: JCfarn

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier. Packaged well, instructions were super easy to follow. Everything included. Took about an hour and a half from opening box, assembling, some trial and error, to light bulbs-one person. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture! A couple of the circles wouldn’t exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture! A couple of the circles wouldn’t exactly stay in place but it was easily fixed with a couple of tiny zip ties that aren’t noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer jones

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with my purchase!! I've had my eye on this light for awhile! It was such a great price compared to other home improvement stores for a similar light. It's a statement in our foyer! Easy to assemble and hang. It's the perfect size too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments. Very easy to put together, installation was quick! A must buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: grace Arcovio

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Looks very nice in my new first home. So glad a got it as I get many compliments :).
customer_reviews.author: Sena

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous light!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous light looks very expensive and is very large. We bought this for our last house and are now repurchasing for our current house. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse toppen

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love it....little tricky to hold it together while finishing, but the zip ties and a little gorilla glue and there ya have it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, didnt work for me, reflected the beams all over the ceiling which we DIDNT want.
customer_reviews.author: Word

customer_reviews.title: It is more beautiful and striking than in pictures
customer_reviews.text: This light is one of a kind definitely a conversation point, I got it installed over my dining room table and it looks superb. I ordered the larger size and was concerned it won't fit but once table set was delivered it all came together . Best purchase !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch 27

customer_reviews.title: Modern and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous chandelier! Husband and I easily installed it together with no issue. I of course didn't realize it didn't come with light bulbs so put old ones in. Will update to see how it handles over time
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is tedious, but great final look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this light, assembling a round light has it's challenges. Metal is thinner but sturdy when all assembled. Looks great up in room. People compliment it often.
customer_reviews.author: m. rendulic

customer_reviews.title: Orb chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great price. Good quality and looks gorgeous. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous !
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous !!! Exactly what I was looking for. The perfect centerpiece for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Canarm ICH282B05ORB25 Sumerside 5 Light Chandelier, Oil Rubbed Bronze
product_meta.description: Color:Oil-rubbed BronzeCanarm LTD Sumer side ICH282B05ORB25 5 light chandelier features candelabra lights circled by rings of oil rubbed bronze. Spin into orbit with this uniquely styled spherical chandelier and let the charming candelabras light up your universe. Cañar has a long and successful history of supplying lighting and ceiling fans. They work diligently to create a comprehensive selection of styles and designs as well as maintaining high standards of product quality and value.
feature_bullets: Requires 5 vintage filament 60 Watt bulbs, Type C (not included)
